definition: an injury that doesn't break the skin but results in some discoloration, to damage by abrasion or pressure, such as plant tissue
details:
noun
- an injury that doesn't break the skin but results in some discoloration
= synonyms: contusion
verb
- to damage by abrasion or pressure, such as plant tissue
= example: to damage by abrasion or pressure, such as plant tissue
- to break up into small pieces for food preparation
= example: to break up into small pieces for food preparation
- to injure the underlying soft tissue or bone of
= example: to injure the underlying soft tissue or bone of
= synonyms: contuse
- to hurt the feelings of
= example: to hurt the feelings of
= synonyms: hurt
